title: Regifted Amumu Bug (Gameplay)
body:
In one of my games I was playing Amumu and I was using the skin Regifted Amumu. It seems when Amumu dies with that skin on and get revived by a Zilean ulti, the skin loses its ribbon??? I was able to view this on the replay, I as well saw it during my game and the person I was duoing with saw it too.
If you want to do this yourself just make sure you are in a game using the Regifted Amumu skin and have someone play Zilean and revive you when you die.
I'm not sure if this happens with Guardian Angel too but yea. Happens with Zilean ulti.


Screenshot Gyazo thingy: https://gyazo.com/0397a7bdee458d5ec643999ccb16a00b
Youtube Video of the replay: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=t3YtIxb1Kms

replies.body:
Hi there! 

As if this poor dude didn't have it hard enough. ;_; Thanks for the report! We'll poke around and see what may be causing this to occur. I assume it has to do with any sort of revive. D:
Ca....ca...can't believe you would take amumu's ribbon.... that you would take his soul ;(
